com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.indentstrategies
Class TagIndentStrategy

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.text.DefaultAutoIndentStrategy
      com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.indentstrategies.CFEIndentStrategy
          com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.indentstrategies.TagIndentStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.text.IAutoEditStrategy, org.eclipse.jface.text.IAutoIndentStrategy
public class TagIndentStrategy
extends CFEIndentStrategy

This represents a tag-based auto-indent strategy. It not only does the auto-indenting, but it also does the auto-closing & step-through of various characters.

Author:
Oliver Tupman

Field Summary

          Don't indent
